title: r/Choosingbeggars "Your Baby Died? THEN GIVE ME YOUR LEFTOVER BABY STUFF!"
description: r/Choosingbeggars People on this subreddit have a reputation for being truly horrible people, but the woman in today's post is one of the worst of the worst. After a new mother tragically loses her child, this choosing beggar starts harassing the woman on the phone, demanding that the mother hand over her leftover baby clothes and toys. That's just pure evil! If you like this content, subscribe for more daily Reddit videos!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
